QuestData.Title: Skin of the Saurok
QuestData.Description: Ihgaluk Crag is a dangerous place. Luckily, you have the magic of the Sunreavers behind you.$b$bI can transform you into a saurok.$b$bI will perform the first half of the illusion on you now. Afterwards, you should go directly to Ihgaluk Crag and slay one of the Skumblade saurok. Once you have done this, I will contact you and complete the second half of the illusion.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: I will transform you to look like a saurok.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Ihgaluk Crag and slay a Skumblade saurok.
